messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

can this be adjusted to that they re logged into your queue instead and then for you to assign them to the groups as active tuesday october pm has assigned hi these requests logged automatically queues perhaps ignored by certain filters queues change over rules become erroneous adjusted re logged queue instead then assign groups active please adjust rule correctly logged queue instead which supports similarly please disable snow queue per se thank october has assigned guys please how has logged please take care thank lead has assigned hello please advised record number has assigned please review details take appropriate action summary requested item details please link kind regards ref msg registered under number whose registered old broad street kingdom provide clients each subsidiaries separate leg
